overview:
## Discussion

By default, the window tab’s tooltip displays its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowTab/title] string. Once customized, setting the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowTab/toolTip] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0] causes it to follow the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowTab/title] property again.

# toolTip

**Instance Property**

The tooltip for this window tab.

## Declaration

```swift
var toolTip: String! { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, the window tab’s tooltip displays its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowTab/title] string. Once customized, setting the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowTab/toolTip] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0] causes it to follow the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowTab/title] property again.
title: toolTip
